questions.question: The expert stated that the problem ---- more serious than initially thought.
questions.explanation: 'stated' past tense reporting verb olduğu için tense backshift uygulanır: 'is' → 'was'.

questions.question: She asked me ---- the report by the end of the week.
questions.explanation: 'ask someone to do something' yapısı kullanılır. Dolaylı emir/rica.

questions.question: The study suggests that regular exercise ---- the risk of heart disease.
questions.explanation: 'suggests' Present tense ve genel gerçek olduğu için tense backshift yapılmaz.

questions.question: He wondered ---- she had been so upset the previous day.
questions.explanation: 'Why was she upset?' sorusunun dolaylı anlatımı. Soru kelimesi 'why' korunur.

questions.question: The manager warned us ---- the deadline under any circumstances.
questions.explanation: 'warn someone not to do something' yapısı. 'not' infinitive'den önce gelir.

questions.question: The scientist announced that the team ---- a significant breakthrough the month before.
questions.explanation: 'the month before' past time reference ve reporting verb 'announced' (past) olduğu için Past Perfect kullanılır.

questions.question: She inquired ---- the results of the experiment were ready.
questions.explanation: Yes/No sorusunun dolaylı anlatımında 'if' veya 'whether' kullanılır.

questions.question: The author claims that his theory ---- a new perspective on the issue.
questions.explanation: 'claims' Present tense ve hâlâ geçerli bir durum olduğu için tense backshift yapılmaz.

questions.question: He told me that he ---- in London for five years before moving to Paris.
questions.explanation: İki geçmiş olay var: önce London'da yaşadı, sonra Paris'e taşındı. İlk olay için Past Perfect: 'had lived'.

questions.question: The professor suggested that students ---- the article before the next class.
questions.explanation: 'suggest that someone should do something' yapısı tavsiye için kullanılır.

questions.question: She reminded me ---- my passport when I go to the airport.
questions.explanation: 'remind someone to do something' yapısı kullanılır.

questions.question: The witness insisted that he ---- the suspect near the scene that night.
questions.explanation: 'insisted' past tense ve olay daha önceki bir zamanda gerçekleşti. Past Perfect: 'had seen'.

questions.question: He asked me ---- I had completed the assignment.
questions.explanation: Yes/No sorusunun dolaylı anlatımı: 'if' veya 'whether' kullanılır.

questions.question: The committee recommended that the policy ---- revised.
questions.explanation: 'recommend that something be done' subjunctive yapısı. Base form kullanılır.

questions.question: She explained that she ---- unable to attend the meeting the day before.
questions.explanation: 'the day before' past time reference. 'explained' past tense. Past Perfect: 'had been'.

questions.question: The teacher asked ---- had submitted their homework on time.
questions.explanation: 'Who submitted...?' sorusunun dolaylı anlatımı. Soru kelimesi 'who' korunur.

questions.question: He promised that he ---- the project by Friday.
questions.explanation: 'promised' past tense, gelecek için 'would finish' kullanılır (will → would backshift).

questions.question: The researcher mentioned that the data ---- collected over a period of three years.
questions.explanation: 'mentioned' past tense ve veri toplama daha önceki bir zamanda tamamlandı. Past Perfect Passive: 'had been collected'.

questions.question: She wanted to know ---- the conference would take place.
questions.explanation: 'Where will the conference take place?' sorusunun dolaylı anlatımı. 'where' korunur.

questions.question: The doctor advised me ---- smoking immediately.
questions.explanation: 'advise someone to do something' yapısı tavsiye için kullanılır.
